Summary: Wife filmed 2 orbs of light through her car window flying above, then the spun around and shot down to ground and went behind trees.
divs: Sighting DetailsMy wife witnessed 2 glowing orbs in the sky while she was driving down our street on SE Sherrett St. She has an incredible video that she shot from her iPhone, through her windshield. The lights spun around each other and then descended to the ground where they then went behind some trees and out of view. She is very reluctant to share this experience, so I am writing this for her. The video is 34 seconds long, and it is incredible.
